Name: SplitCondition
Description: Condition for using this stage. Use only when multiple top level stages are used.

Name: FrameRequirements
Description: Describes the minimum requirements of the frame needed to use this sample stage. For example, if a stratification by age is specified in the stage the sample frame would need to support this stratification.

Name: RecommendedFrameReference
Description: Identifies a specific sample frame or frames appropriate for this plan.

Name: Stratification
Description: Describe all stratifications here. Note that each stratified group will be sampled using the same sampling plan. For example stratifying a state by ZIP Code areas in each of 5 mean income quintiles and then doing a random sample of the households in set of ZIP Codes. Allows for oversampling of identified subpopulations.

Name: TypeOfPlan
Description: Indicate PlanCode if different from parent. Note that all strata resulting from the stratification process must use the same sampling plan.

Name: SelectionProbability
Description: If known and available, provide the selection probability for each sampling unit.  This is one number for equal probability sampling, such as SRS.  For PPS, a description of the size criterion is needed.  For other unequal designs, a description of of how the probabilities are assigned is needed.

Name: SubStage
Description: A substage assumes that its sample frame is the result of its parent stage.
